heading: Perspective
headline: I’ve accumulated a broad range of career experiences that inform my UX work.

points: Customer service: Resolving problems triggered by issues in the digital user experience
Web development: Building projects through the full stack and advancing my understanding of how design integrates with code
Nonprofits: Fostering cooperation among diverse stakeholders and coordinating large programs
Education: Coaching, teaching, and facilitating workshops while gaining valuable perspective on how to reach all kinds of people
Recruitment and canvassing: Honing persuasive messages and establishing rapport

cta.text: How my career journey has led to UX

heading: Skills
headline: I'll integrate my UX and web development know-how to quickly add value to your team.

points: Conducting user interviews and usability testing, synthesizing data into actionable findings
Using Figma to create responsive, component-based interfaces that can be easily translated into front-end code
Iterating on designs through sketches, low-fidelity and high-fidelity prototypes
Ideating on concepts with personas, scenarios, and user flows
Understanding key aspects of web performance that affect the user experience
Developing knowledge in the core elements of the web: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Utilizing the React ecosystem to build dynamic front-end applications with component-based architecture
Managing databases, building REST APIs, and deploying full-stack projects

cta.text: How my web development experience has shaped my UX work

heading: Training
headline: I've always been an independent learner, and I’ve driven my learning throughout my experience in tech.

points: Completing an online specialization in UX research and design from the University of Michigan
Learning essential UX practices from cornerstone texts and a variety of online resources
Building projects from scratch while independently completing a full-stack web development bootcamp
Designing an individualized major that combined psychology and anthropology, conducting ethnographic research and studying how people perceive and learn

cta.text: My approach to building skill in UX methods

heading: Strengths
headline: I bring my strengths in strategy, empathy, and communication to the table.

points: Investigating problems and synthesizing information to make strategic decisions
Being communicative, flexible, and sensitive to team members’ needs
Quickly taking ownership in my projects
Harnessing empathy to see designs through the lens of users
